content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day June 7, 2021 Ransomware Attacks Are Here to Stay June 7, 2021 Following the highly publicized and successful 4M ransom of Colonial Pipeline, attacks like these will only get more popular. Indeed this week, the New York Times reported Ransomware Disrupts Meat Plants in Latest Attack on Critical U.S. Business. These attacks are here to stay. Are you ready?
